body:
@gregglind @mattgrimes The spec above has us modifying the `surveyId` that ends up in telemetry, are ya'll okay with this change? It lines up with what you suggested in the legal bug.

Are we just waiting for the legal bug to be resolved (and your approval) before working on this?
